snippet: The chairman of Hyundai said sales at Hyundai and at Kia would likely grow just 4 percent in 2014 because Japanese rivals would have an advantage.
lead_paragraph: The chairman of Hyundai said sales at Hyundai and at Kia would likely grow just 4 percent in 2014 because Japanese rivals would have an advantage.

headline.main: Weak Yen Takes a Toll on Hyundai Sales Forecast
headline.print_headline: Weak Yen Takes a Toll on Hyundai Sales Forecast
